pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Superfacelift Skin Firming Cream 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors superfacelift™ is the original "facelift" in a jar that works to reduce forehead wrinkles by 86% in 4 weeks. 50ml.

Skin Doctors superfacelift™ is the original "facelift" in a jar. It is a micro encapsulated retinol to:Reduce the appearance of forehead wrinkles by up to 86% in 4 weeksReduce the appearance of crow's feet by 63% in 8 weeksIt helps to:Improve the cell renewal processStimulate synthesis of collagen and elastinImprove firmness, tone & moisturisation of the skinRecommended for:All skin types. Caution sensitive skins. Not for use in pregnancy.Reduced skin firmness and loss of elasticitySallow and sagging skinAged skin as treatment - 40's +

Size: 50ml

Ingredients

Key Ingredients:ProDEJineâ„¢ - a purified yeast extract that reinforces and strengthens the dermo-epidermal junction of the skin (thin structure between dermis and epidermis) and stimulates protein synthesis.Tagravit R -encapsulated Retinol (vitamin A), which is only activated upon application to the skin. This prevents the oxidation of the retinol and provides for a much more concentrated cream as it has not disintegrated throughout its shelf life or slow usage. Retinol has anti-ageing activity (wrinkles, lines and loss of elasticity), is highly effective for UV damaged skin and assists in improving the cell renewal process.Vitamin E - a naturally derived super anti-oxidant which helps to correct damage to the skin caused by UV rays.Lactic Acid - a type of Alpha Hydroxy Acid which increases the water holding ability of the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.All Ingredients:Water (Aqua), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Lactic Acid, Cetostearyl Alcohol, Mannitol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Sodium Hydroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Retinol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Cyclodextrin, Yeast (Faex) Extract, Tricaprylin, BHT, Disodium Succinate, Cyclohexasiloxane, Ceteareth-20, Phenyl Trimethicone, Magnesium Aluminium Silicate, Xanthan Gum, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Propylparaben, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Fragrance (Parfum), Citronellol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional.

Directions

Usage: Face, neck, décolletage. Avoid the under eye area. Process: After cleansing with Skin Doctors pH balancing cleanser, pat dry and massage a pea sized amount into your face, neck and décolletage. Best results: Use morning and night. Use in conjunction with Skin Doctors™ SPF protection during the day and your choice of Skin Doctors™ moisturiser at night. Due to the AHA and Vitamin A in this product increased sun sensitivity may beexperienced. Supermoist SPF 50 MUST be used daily when using Superfacelift.
